steps.text: Enter the room on the lower level of the ◀Knights of Favonius Library▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Knights_of_Favonius_Library▷
Explore the ◀mysterious room▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Mysterious_Room▷‍[Does this step ever appear in the game? When does the quest end?]

While in the room, the player's party is limited to the ◀Traveler▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Traveler▷. They cannot use their ◀Talents▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Talent▷, and the ◀Party▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Party▷ screen cannot be accessed.
